featured.text: She cut a plank of wood into two pieces, each about two feet wide and one foot long.

definition.zh_def: 一塊長而扁平的木板或其他材料，通常用於建築或製作家具。
definition.en_def: A long, flat piece of wood or other material, typically used in construction or for making furniture.
definition.example: He used a plank of wood to build a shelf.
